cause.description:
My cousin had this, and it still has a chance of coming back. When someone gets this specific cancer, they need a bone marrow transplant, and chemo, and radiation. It is a lot, and if one doesn't get a match, well things can happen.
1. Help raise money for a cure
cause.mission: support kids who have this cancer, that usually hits men over 65
cause.name: Support against Mylodesplagia Cancer (a blood cancer) ncer,
